00024 void CTracker_surf::Match(IplImage *img)
00025 {
00026 cout<<"entro en el match"<<endl;
00027 IplImage *grey =cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(img),8,1);
00028 cvCvtColor(img,grey,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00029 
00030 IplImage *grey2 =cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(img),8,1);
00031 cvCvtColor(img,grey2,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00032 
00033 surf.img = grey;
00034 cvClearSeq( feat );
00035 surf.find_features( grey,feat, levels);
00036 
00037 float ang;
00038 int *desc;
00039 int *samples1;
00040 samples1=new int[64*feat->total];
00041 CvMat *new_points = cvCreateMat(feat->total,4,CV_32FC1) ;
00042 for( int i = 0; i < feat->total; i++ )
00043     {
00044          CvPoint3D32f point = *(CvPoint3D32f*)cvGetSeqElem( feat, i );
00045          ang=surf.orientation((int)point.x,(int)point.y,(int)point.z);
00046          desc=surf.descriptor((int)point.x,(int)point.y,(int)point.z,ang);
00047          cvCircle(grey2 , cvPoint((int)point.x,(int)point.y), (int)(point.z*3.0), cvScalar(255));
00048          cvLine(grey2,cvPoint((int)point.x,(int)point.y),
00049                         cvPoint((int)(point.x+point.z*3.0*sin(ang)),
00050                                 (int)(point.y+point.z*3.0*cos(ang))),cvScalar(255));
00051 
00052          cvmSet(new_points,i,0,point.x) ;
00053          cvmSet(new_points,i,1,point.y) ;
00054          cvmSet(new_points,i,2,point.z) ;
00055          cvmSet(new_points,i,3,ang) ;
00056          for (int di=0; di<64; di++){
00057               samples1[i*64+di]=(unsigned char )(desc[di]+128);
00058          }
00059          delete desc;
00060     }
00061   int key[64];
00062         for ( list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=pMap->bbdd.begin();
00063                 It != pMap->bbdd.end(); It++ )
00064         {
00065              if((*It)->projx>(9*levels+1) && (*It)->projx<img->width-(9*levels+1) &&
00066                 (*It)->projy>(9*levels+1) && (*It)->projy<img->height-(9*levels+1))
00067              {
00068                  for (int d=0; d<64;d++)
00069                  {
00070                      key[d]=(*It)->key[d];
00071                  }
00072 
00073                  int n = surf.nearest_neighbor_2(key,samples1,feat->total,
00074                                            cvPoint((int)(*It)->projx,(int)(*It)->projy),
00075                                            new_points,50);
00076 
00077                  if(n==-1)//en caso de no encorar fallo
00078                  {
00079                      cout<<"no match "<<endl;
00080                      if((*It)->state==st_inited)
00081                      {
00082                         std::cout << "borropuntos: "<<(*It)->pto.x<<" "<<(*It)->pto.y<<std::endl;
00083                         (*It)->state = st_no_view;
00084                         pMap->visible--;
00085                      }else if((*It)->state!=st_no_view)
00086                      {
00087                         cout<< "borro punto por no iniciado y fuera devista " << endl;
00088                 //      pMap->bbdd.erase(It);
00089                 //      pMap->visible--;
00090                      }
00091                      (*It)->pto.x=0;
00092                      (*It)->pto.y=0;
00093                  }
00094                  else//encaso de exito
00095                  {
00096                    (*It)->old_pto.x=(*It)->pto.x;
00097                    (*It)->old_pto.y=(*It)->pto.y;
00098                    (*It)->pto.x=(int)cvmGet(new_points,n,0);
00099                    (*It)->pto.y=(int)cvmGet(new_points,n,1);
00100                    if((*It)->state==st_no_view)
00101                    {
00102                         (*It)->state=st_inited;
00103                         pMap->visible++;
00104                    }
00105                  }
00106             }else
00107             {
00108               (*It)->state=st_no_view;
00109               pMap->visible--;
00110             } //end if proj dentro borde 
00111         }//end for cada elemento del mapa
00112         cvShowImage("win",grey2);
00113         cvWaitKey(100);
00114 
00115 cvReleaseImage(&grey);
00116 cvReleaseImage(&grey2);
00117 delete samples1;
00118 cvReleaseMat(&new_points);
00119 }

00175 void CTracker_surf::Descriptor(IplImage *img, CvPoint *point,int s, int *key)
00176 {
00177      IplImage *grey =cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(img),8,1);
00178      cvCvtColor(img,grey,CV_RGB2GRAY);
00179      surf.img=grey;
00180      float ang;
00181      int *desc;
00182      ang=surf.orientation((int)point->x,(int)point->y,s);
00183      desc=surf.descriptor((int)point->x,(int)point->y,s,ang);
00184      for (int di=0; di<64; di++){
00185            key[di]=desc[di]+128;
00186      }
00187         delete desc;
00188      cvReleaseImage(&grey);
00189 }
